languages.text: "Хейнрикс, прошу тебя. Я хочу избежать нового кровопролития".

traits.locale_text: "Хейнрикс, прошу тебя. Я хочу избежать нового кровопролития".

languages.text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, прошу тебя. Я хочу избежать нового кровопролития".

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."
"Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."
"Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."
"Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."
"Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

languages.text: « Heinrix, allons ! Je tiens à éviter un nouveau bain de sang. »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, allons ! Je tiens à éviter un nouveau bain de sang. »

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、頼む！これ以上血を流したくないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、頼む！これ以上血を流したくないのだ」

languages.text: “拜托了，海因里希！我不想再让更多人流血了。”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

traits.locale_text: “拜托了，海因里希！我不想再让更多人流血了。”

languages.text: "Heinrix, bitte! Ich will es vermeiden, noch mehr Blut zu vergießen."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, bitte! Ich will es vermeiden, noch mehr Blut zu vergießen."

languages.text: «¡Heinrix, por favor! Quiero evitar más derramamientos de sangre».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

traits.locale_text: «¡Heinrix, por favor! Quiero evitar más derramamientos de sangre».

languages.text: "Heinrix, lütfen! Daha da fazla kan dökmek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, please! I want to avoid spilling even more blood."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix lütfen! Daha da fazla kan dökmek istemiyorum."
